amendment.description: To amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to clarify the meaning of the term "aggregate value" for purposes of the Presidential drawdown authority.

action.text: Amendment SA 838 under the order of 7/19/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 192.

Amendment SA 838 proposed by Senator Vance for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3138-3139) To amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to clarify the meaning of the term "aggregate value" for purposes of the Presidential drawdown authority.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 838 proposed by Senator Vance for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 935.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 838 under the order of 7/19/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 192.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 838 under the order of 7/19/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 60. Record Vote Number: 192.
